New Records: Kevin Durant made his 10,000th field goal during the game
Key Match Events: The Suns nearly collapsed late in the game but managed to win
The Blazers came back from a 20-point deficit to within two points with minutes left
Devin Booker made free throws in the final minutes to secure the victory
Post-Match Reflections: The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns had a strong third quarter, outscoring the Blazers by 18 points
The Blazers' comeback in the fourth quarter was a highlight
Others: Devin Booker led all scorers with 28 points, nine assists, and nine rebounds
Grayson Allen had 18 points and three blocks
Jerami Grant scored 20 points and seven rebounds
Deandre Ayton had 10 points and 13 rebounds
